biotools.summary: Application that enables quantitative analysis and visualization of medical images of numerous modalities such as PET, MRI, CT, or microscopy. Using it’s standard user-interface and analysis tools, researchers at remote sites (via the internet) can easily share research data and analyses, thereby enhancing their ability to research, diagnose, monitor, and treat medical disorders.
